In Israel, a Big Mac costs 6.5$.
A Big Mac/Vegas/Texas and etc meal with regular sized beverage and fries is 
12.5$.
McFlurry is 3$ for a regular cup and 4.3$ for a big cup.
Pretty pricey I'd say, even the salad is about 6$, no wonder obesity is a 
problem.
